official_languages: Russian 1 ,,  Moldovan 2  (official only in its Cyrillic form),,  Ukrainian
leader_title1: President of the Transnistrian Moldovan Republic
sovereignty_type: Autonomous territory of the Republic of Moldova that is de facto independent
footnote1: Russian is the main official language and the lingua franca
footnote3: Limited to breakaway Abkhazia and South Ossetia, see Community for Democracy and Rights of Nations
footnote4: Moldovan leu used in the localities under Moldovan control and in the security zone
